text: Uye paakanga akura (mwana wake) zvekukwanisa kufamba naye, (Ibrahim (Abrahamu)) akati: “Iwe mwana wangu! Zvirokwazvo, ndaona kuhope ndichikucheka (sechipiro kuna Allah). Naizvozvo unozviona sei?” Akati: “Imi baba vangu! Itai zvamaudzwa, kana Allah vachida, muchandiwana ndiri pakati peavo vanotsungirira.”
